event_details.description: Join the Code Marathon at MRCE Campus on September 12, 2024, and elevate your coding skills while competing for exciting prizes. Every participant will be recognized with a certificate, and top performers will earn prizes and recognition. With a registration fee of just ₹100, this event offers the perfect opportunity to enhance programming knowledge, network with peers and professionals, and boost your confidence through challenging coding tasks.

round_details.description: Solve complex algorithmic problems within a time limit. Topics may include dynamic programming, graph theory, and more.
Participants are tasked with identifying and fixing bugs in provided code snippets.
Optimize a given solution to run within the required time and space limits.

first_place.description: Awarded to the top performer in the Code Marathon.

second_place.description: Awarded to the second-highest performer in the Code Marathon.

certificate.description: Every participant will be awarded a certificate of participation.
